title: About Zarbor Somsa House
description1: Zarbor Somsa House is a center for delicious samsas baked in a traditional style. Every day, we serve thousands of friends with samsas made from natural meat, fresh dough, and prepared by experienced chefs.
description2: The quality and taste of our products are our pride. Zarbor Somsa House is not just a place to eat â€” it's a hub of culture, warmth, and hospitality.

stats.branches: Branches in the city of Jarbdor

banner2.title: Samsa: A National Dish
banner2.text1: Samsa is a delicious national dish baked or fried in a tandoor.
banner2.text2: It can be filled with meat, potatoes, or vegetables.
banner2.text3: Every region has its own unique recipe.

description: Our team is ready to assist you! If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

main.description1: Discover Asr-Somsa, the tastiest Samsas and dishes of Uzbekistan.
main.description2: Our samsas and dishes are prepared traditionally, adding love to every purchase.
